What You'll Be Doing As a Python Software Developer Intern, you'll have the opportunity to: • Work embedded within a team of developers and QA members. • Participate in daily stand-up meetings, and design and technical discussions. • Write and design readable, maintainable and performant code. • Analyze (debug) issues and properly resolve them if feasible. • Learn and understand new (and existing) technologies based on planned new features. • Write and maintain technical documentation based on code implementation. • Test implementations and create automated tests around code written. • Evaluate development tools and existing technologies for internal use.
